The Bravest Slayer
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Epics In Progress, Section III: The Bravest Slayer
By Mewger on Thursday, September 30, 2004 - 05:59 pm:

Hello! This is Mewger. I decided to try my hand at some MR fiction. Enjoy ^_^

-The Bravest Slayer-

In this time, as in any time, there is good, and there is evil.

And it is the evil that grows in this time.

Shadowlux, a Zan from lands unknown, who killed his breeder and countless others, hunted and feared and adored...

Shadowlux, a secret monster organization, devoted to the former and samely named Zan was on the rise, rising like smoke from the faults leading to hell and all else lower...

The Three. Monsters of Power. Shadowlux's greatest allies, and most powerful friends.

Gitan. Sneaky. Intelligent. An excellent spy.

Joker. Brutal. Comitted. Comitted to death. A more suitable power killer you could not find.

Devata. A Skull Mew. The most devoted, the most amazed by the dark power. An assassin and master thief. If it needed to be obtained, Devata...was your Mew. Devata's claws always found their target. She was--Devata the Slayer.


And it is Devata that we watch now, Devata whose story unfolds.

For Devata was given a single order.

"In Ragedom, the ranch, Devata, the Dragon holds a great artifact... bring it to me!", cried the dark figure from the thick shadow of the evil innermost chamber.

"Yes, Master Shadowlux.. Whatever you say! Your will is done!"

And it rose. Rose from its throne of all that is vile and stared. Stared with flaming red eyes, a contrast to its dark body, and laughed!

"I will be invincible!", cried Shadowlux, lord of the darkness.

And a small Mew, slinked out into the world, wickedness in her mind and evil in her claws.

But is this truly her path? For evil is not always..what it seems.

End Chapter One

A good story. It keeps readers curious of what will happen next
